The IVMRAspectRatioControl interface controls whether the Video Mixing Renderer Filter 7 (VMR-7) preserves the aspect ratio of the source video. This interface is available when the VMR-7 is operating in either windowed or windowless modes. In windowless mode, the same functionality is provided by the interface.
